QA Financial Forum Milano

Test Architecture for Global Platforms

  • Home
29 January 2020

I was invited as a keynote speaker at QA Financial Forum Milano. I presented my talk Test Architecture for Global Platforms.

I talked about:

  • Test architectures and challenges
  • How to design global platform
  • What are the tools and frameoworks that can help
  • How to maintain continuous testing
